alert.note: Alert for Latimer; McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:01AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern McIntosh, northwestern Latimer and Pittsburg Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 601 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indianola to 2 miles north of Haywood to Stuart. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Wilburton... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Crowder... Alderson... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Ashland... Higgins... Haywood... Blocker... Robbers Cave State Park... Arrowhead State Park... Mcalester Regional Airport... Scipio... Blanco... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
